glosses: to meet, to reach, to achieve

examples.translation: We have achieved all our goals.

examples.text: Kayıp çocuğuna dört yıl sonra kavuşacak.
examples.translation: After four years she will be reunited with her missing child.

etymology:
From Ottoman Turkish قاوشمق (kavuşmak), from Old Anatolian Turkish [script needed] (qavušmaq), from *qabuš-, from Proto-Turkic *kab-.
Cognate with Kazakh қауысу (qauysu), Azerbaijani qovuşmaq, etc.
